summary: Three adventurers leave Moon City and head towards the asteroids in search of gold.
cast: Rutger Hauer|Joan Chen|Harold Pruett|Brion James|Morgan Hunter|Don Stroud|Philippe Mora|Aleks Shaklin|Tim DeZarn|Anthony Guidera|Shay Duffin|Jonathan Ball|David Michael O'Neill|John Dennis Johnston|John Sobestanovich|Douchan Gersi|Bryan McMillen|Buckley Norris|Jenny DuBasso|Madeleine Mora|D. Danny Warhol
title: Yacimiento lunar
